meanings.definition: The political group or movement advocating for social equality and progressive policies.
meanings.sent1: The leftwing in the country is pushing for fair wages and better healthcare for all.
meanings.sent2: I support the leftwing because they fight for equal rights and opportunities for everyone.
meanings.sent3: The leftwing made a joke about having a 'leftwing party' where everyone shares equally.
meanings.sent4: Her passion for social justice made her embrace the leftwing ideals with all her heart.
meanings.sent5: The leftwing's commitment to equality shines brightly in their policies and actions.

meanings.definition: Positioned on or relating to the side of the body opposite to the right.
meanings.sent1: She pointed to her leftwing arm when asked about her injury.
meanings.sent2: The leftwing side of the room had a beautiful view of the sunset.
meanings.sent3: He joked that his leftwing leg was always the first to fall asleep.
meanings.sent4: The leftwing door of the building opened to reveal a stunning garden.
meanings.sent5: The leftwing part of the painting captured the attention of all viewers with its vibrant colors.
